title: Instagram unplugs its IGTV app as it focuses on simplifying video viewing
content:
We’ve reached a point where the video format has become prominent across social media platforms. Services are coming up with new and creative ways to share videos on their respective apps. They’re even copying each other’s strategies and tools to further heat up the endless competition between online rivals. We’ve probably all seen the TikTok

The post Instagram unplugs its IGTV app as it focuses on simplifying video viewing appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Instagram will no longer be supporting its IGTV app. The company is now focusing on simplifying video viewing on the main app.
